item.description:
Greetings Early-birds!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
THIS EVENT HAS BEEN CANCELED.
We apologize!!

Hope to see you at one of our upcoming hikes. We will reschedule for this venue if there is interest.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



There are few weekends remaining for fall hiking, so, for those of you who can't get enough foliage and delicious fall air, join us for an afternoon hike this Sunday at Devil's Den in Weston.

LOCATION: This Meetup will take place at Devil's Den, which is a nature preserve in Weston, CT.

WHEN AND WHERE: Meet at the entrance, which is located at the end of Pent Road, between 12:45 and 1:00, and we'll try to get rolling onto the trail by 1:15.

BRING: water! (And a snack if you like.)

WEAR: Hiking or other sturdy shoes with treads; LAYERS; a hat.

DIRECTIONS: Please see links below. The park website offers directions, or click on the link to Google Maps, then click "Get Directions To Here," and get customized directions from your home.

Links:
Park Website

Google Map: Pent Road (dead-ends at the preserve's main parking area)
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah (Group Organizer) will be wearing orange pants for Halloween.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: CANCELLED - Short-notice Celebratory Sunday Afternoon Hike
